{"blocks":[{"key":"do3bv","text":"Grow and expand cells in IMDM medium supplied with 10%
FCS and Pen/Strep until the required number of cells is reached. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d01sb","text":"Prep size: For one preparation of vesicles the required amount is
